name: Aganorsa Leaf - La Validacion - Corojo - Gran Robusto
additionalNotes: The Aganorsa Leaf Validacion (formerly known as Casa Fernandez Aganorsa) Corojo is a full-strength Nicaraguan puro that is handmade in Nicaragua. It features a dark, reddish Corojo wrapper placed over a binder and filler made of premium Nicaraguan tobaccos. The Aganorsa Leaf Validacion Corojo is a hearty, fully flavored cigar that goes great as an after-dinner smoke. The cigars undergo a rigorous quality control process before they are finally released.Â
